body_html:
I do see your changes to workspace.bzl and the empty //BUILD file though. I
think it is in then.

On Wed, Sep 7, 2016 at 9:11 AM, Damien Martin-Guillerez <
notifications@github.com> wrote:

This is the correct way (although the two parameters of tf_worskpace are
going away) Unfortuntately, #4055
#4055 got rolled-back
because of an internal breakage. I've rolled it forward as cl/131951691
https://critique.corp.google.com/#review/131951691 but it does seems to
have hit the github repository yet.

—

think it is in then.
